name: Mary Morrissey
what_you_do: Mary Morrissey has made it her mission for over four decades to empower people to create lives they LOVE living.
who_you_serve: people all around the world, from all walks of life and of all ages
social_proof: Mary holds a Master's Degree in Counseling Psychology and an honorary Doctorate in Humane Letters, has spoken three times at the United Nations, facilitated three week-long meetings with His Holiness The Dalai Lama and other world leaders, and met with Nelson Mandela in Cape Town, South Africa to address the most significant issues our world is facing. She's also the author of two best-selling books, No Less Than Greatness and Building Your Field of Dreams, which became a PBS special.
signature_programs: the "Brave Thinking Method", the DreamBuilder Program, Life Coach Certification Programs
business_focus: Empowering people to create lives they love living through transformational tools, programs, and coaching.
service_provided: life coaching, personal development programs, speaking, consulting
